body:
@SD15
The two Asukas (Soryu, from the original NGE series, and Shikinami, from NGE Rebuild) are trapped in a room with Shinji (which version was never made clear, but likely the sliiiightly more confident Rebuild version). Shikinami, beginning to lose it from being trapped in a room with no amenities, and, because she has more feelings for Shinji than Soryu did, offers to let Shinji use her as fap material (and, later, sex) to take her mind off things. Soryu, being the more competitive Asuka, takes this as a challenge and, despite her usual disdain for Shinji, starts pleasuring him first, though with her usual attitude. Things escalate from there, until, in the heat of the competition and pleasure, the two Asukas became Shinji’s sex slaves. I might be missing a detail or two, or might have gotten a detail or two wrong, but that’s my take on it.
Wasn't bad, but I could barely follow what was going on
I may not come back to this one but man I came buckets.
